author: davidlange6
body:
Partly address issues in pre-mixing workflows due to recent RECO developments. Main changes are to port the bunchSpacing object forward from the premixed sample (who is the authoritative source of the information), and second to remove the bunchSpacing int from the DIGi step (who does not know the pileup). 

Also I remove some loud printouts from the L1.
title: Premixing cleanup
